dataset_title_etc_main: All of the Factories in LuZhou
dataset_expl_etc_main: RESEARCH BACKGROUND: 'All of the factories in LuZhou' documents and records the 3000+ industrial buildings slated for demolition in LuZhou, a district in Taiwan's capital city, Taipei. This project is a homage to Ed Ruscha's 'Every Building on the Sunset Strip' (1966), and investigates the collection, a technique borrowed from art practice, as an architectural design method. The work is positioned in the research areas of 'the everyday', 'bottom-up urbanism', and more importantly in the emerging research into the impact that (light) industry has on the economic and social sustainability of our cities. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION: The work is a survey of the threatened buildings and the associated job and trade losses in LuZhou. At minimum, it will be a significant archive of Taipei's industrial past, if and when the warehouses are demolished. It puts factories into the mainstream urban design debate. In the installation, the A5 survey documents highlight and personalise the individual jobs and industry that will be lost. From a distance, the wall of images depicts the scale of the imminent destruction. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: This work was the result of a research fellowship at Tamkang University. It was seen by 500+ visitors in this government-sponsored design gallery: industry, academic and government representatives (including the Director of Taipei City Planning). URS 127 Design Gallery is a public space managed by Tamkang University's Department of Architecture; URS stands for Urban Regeneration Station. In the opening speech, the Director of Urban Regeneration noted the importance of the work both as a social and political response.

BACKGROUND: 'Architectural Urbanism: Melbourne/Seoul' was a two-city exhibition funded by RMIT University and the Korean National University, supported by the Australian Government through the Australian International Cultural Council. Kerstin Thompson Architecture (KTA) showed five works - Carrum Downs Police Station, MUMA Gallery, Lake Conneware House, Napier Street Housing and Royal Botanic Gardens Visitor Centre - as one of ten architectural firms (5 from Melbourne, 5 from Seoul) selected to exhibit. The exhibited work included large scale photographs, working drawings and exegetical text. CONTRIBUTION: The exhibition explored architectural approaches that worked 'within the city rather than upon it', architecture that 'intervenes and inserts, rather than overlays or eradicates'. Within this context, the public projects exhibited by KTA explore relationships between interior and exterior, building and street, and the existing and the new. This draws on Thompson's ongoing practice and design research focussing on architecture as a civic endeavour, forging connections between buildings, their surroundings and the people who inhabit them. SIGNIFICANCE: 'Architectural Urbanism' was an international, cross institutional exhibition that received external funding, evidencing significance for the selected works by the 10 participating practices. In Seoul, the exhibition was opened by the deputy Australian Ambassador. The Melbourne exhibition was reviewed in Architecture Australia (AA). These KTA projects have also received multiple awards and media attention including four AIA (Australian Institute of Architects) Victorian Architecture Awards, an IDEA (Interior Design Excellence Awards) award, three book features, critical reviews in AA, and articles in SMH, The Australian, Broadsheet and Archdaily.

dataset_title_etc_main: Urban Still Lifes (with mops and brooms): Beijing version + six minor works
dataset_expl_etc_main: RESEARCH BACKGROUND: The 'Urban Still Life (with mops and brooms): Beijing version' installation depicted an informal occupation of the public realm that lies outside of ownership and traditional property lines, and blurs the edges between public and private, civic and domestic. The project was conceived to be cumulative and comparative as it travelled to three Asian cities; local images were added in Beijing to those collected in previous exhibitions in Seoul and Melbourne. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION: This work builds upon research in bottom-up or micro-urbanism strategies in the Asian city. It develops observational and participatory techniques to enable the general public to engage with urban design issues by contributing to the exhibition with text and images. This work marks a significant shift within Asia. Instead of looking to the West for solutions to contemporary urban design issues, this research proposes that Asia is now providing more appropriate models to deal with the complexity that is facing both eastern and western cities. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: The project received funding support from VESKI (Victorian State Government: $20,000 for four exhibitions). It was exhibited by invitation in CU Space Gallery, the first architecture gallery in China in the prestigious 798 Art Zone. The exhibition and symposium were widely peer-reviewed on the web and in a Chinese architectural journal. As a result of this exhibition, Helsel was invited to develop this research in the curated 'Always on My Mind: Home' exhibition at the Museum of Art at Seoul National University with significant international grant funding.

RESEARCH BACKGROUND: Future Factory is Gretchen Wilkins' entry into 'Competition of Competitions. Organised by Storefront for Art and Architecture in New York, the competition called for the design of an architectural competition. Future Factory won an Honourable Mention and was exhibited, along with the other 17 finalists, at Storefront as part of the 'Letters to the Mayor' exhibition, a group exhibition presenting letters written by 50 international architects to the political leaders of ten cities around the world. Wilkins' project team included Ian Nazareth (practicing architect and researcher) and five RMIT Architecture students. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION: Future Factory calls for architectural ideas about the future of manufacturing, factory spaces and their connection to the city. The competition proposal asserts that contemporary manufacturing thrives on urbanism, and that this presents opportunities to redefine our spatial, social and programmatic connections between production, consumption and everyday life. The overall exhibition, which Future Factory was a part of, was a compilation of briefs, facts, claims, desires and dreams for the construction of our cities, their future foundations and horizons. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: Storefront for Art and Architecture is a landmark international contemporary gallery in New York operating as a critical platform for the promotion and curation of radical investigations into architecture and art. With the intention to provoke long-standing conventions of the architecture competition, the Competition of Competitions attracted more than 100 entries, which were reviewed by a jury of professionals and visionaries including Amale Andraos (Architect, Work AC), Paola Anotonelli (Architecture Curator, MoMA), and Michael Sorkin (Architect and architecture critic). All competition briefs and letters were sent to each respective Mayor after being presented at the gallery.

dataset_title_etc_main: Prototype cells: Acoustic diffusion wall system
dataset_expl_etc_main: RESEARCH BACKGROUND: This project on prototype cells for an acoustic diffusion wall system was selected for the Prototyping Architecture exhibition featuring architects, engineers, manufacturers, product designers, academics and artists to explore the importance of prototypes in the delivery of high quality experimental design. The exhibited cells were selected items from a range of geometric and material mock-ups and tests, used to identify suitable options for production and to understand those that enabled significant design impact. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION This project is a rare example of architectural design research that draws on: 1) architectural design research into strategies for designing around performance criteria in early stage design through the integration of digital simulation; (2) architectural research into the potential of digital fabrication technologies to contribute significant advantages in prototyping and testing of design ideas within architectural design processes; and (3) acoustic research that recognises the emergence of acoustic diffusion as a contributor to acoustic comfort. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: Funded by The Social Science & Humanities Research Council of Canada, the exhibition was curated by Professor Michael Stacey, Director of the Architecture and Tectonics Research Group of the Architecture and Urbanism Research Division (University of Nottingham), in conjunction with the Building Centre Trust. This project was selected alongside works by leading figures in the field including Barkow Leibinger, Renzo Piano Building Wokshop, Philip Beesley Architect inc., Yves Ebnoether, and Zaha Hadid Architects. The exhibition was accompanied by the Prototyping Architecture conference in London. Further peer review was achieved via invitations to exhibit at two other high-profile venues: the Building Centre, London and the Cambridge Galleries, Ontario, Canada.

RESEARCH BACKGROUND: Grace Park House is an ambitious but sensitive large-scale extension and renovation of an ornate heritage-listed Federation (1890-1915) home in the inner eastern Melbourne suburb of Hawthorn. Heritage restrictions forced a careful consideration of the rear façade and its appearance from the street. In response, Iredale Pedersen Hook (IPH) slipped the large-scale addition under the steep pitch of the roof of the host building, creating a dialogue between the old hip roof form and the required volume of the addition. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION: The extension creates a family home with two faces: the demure, front façade and the dynamic rear elevation clad in copper. The expansive extension rises, stealthily, from beneath the terracotta tiles of the original roof and it shifts and distorts beneath the existing structure. The front rooms of the house were restored and a continuity between the two spaces was achieved by the use of marble, waxed recycled timber, copper and bluestone against a neutral colour palette. The project also continues the studio's investigation of the collective upgrading of environmental performance of existing suburbs through the incremental changes made to existing building stock. Here substantial insulation, a large solar array, massive water tank installed in parallel with the swimming pool and an integrated approach to all services sits alongside less technological 'green' innovations such as recycled timber, water-saving fixtures and natural wax finishes. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: The significance of this project is demonstrated by its publication in HOUSES Magazine 76 (Leon van Schaik, 'Grace Darling House', 1 Oct 2010) and in Shanghai Shifu Media's Z-Mag (2011/04, pp. 124-127) and by its inclusion in the international group show, Architectural Urbanism: Melbourne/Seoul at Korean National University of Arts. IPH was one of five Melbourne firms invited to participate.

dataset_title_etc_main: Urban Architectures (Court House, George+Murphy House, Rose House, Fitzroy Community School Creative Space)
dataset_expl_etc_main: RESEARCH BACKGROUND: Court House, George+Murphy House, Fitzroy Community School Creative Space and Rose House are 4 exemplar works of Baracco + Wright Architects, spanning over a diverse range of locations from inner urban areas to sensitive rural and coastal environments. These projects were selected for exhibition in the reciprocal international Seoul/Melbourne exhibition, 'Architectural Urbanism'. Baracco + Wright was one of ten young architectural firms (5 from Melbourne, 5 from Seoul) selected for inclusion in the event. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION: Exhibition curator Melanie Dodd said 'Architectural Urbanism' would explore architectural approaches that worked 'within the city rather than upon it', architecture that 'intervenes and inserts, rather than overlays or eradicates'. The 4 selected works by B+W exemplify this approach, by sharing common ground which transcends their formal differences because of how they play with the threshold and boundaries of urban site conditions as a means to reinterpret the ordinary. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: The Court House was the only one of these 4 works not previously published. The selection of these projects as examples of 'architectural urbanism' inserts this body of work into broader intercultural conversation. The exhibition was funded by RMIT and the Korean National University. The project received external support from the Australian Government through the Australian International Cultural Council: an initiative of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade. The exhibition was opened by the deputy Australian Ambassador in Seoul. A reciprocal exhibition, co-curated by Jong-Kyu Kim, was subsequently held at RMIT's Design Hub.

RESEARCH BACKGROUND The project was an invited design competition commissioned by VicRoads for a pedestrian bridge across a highway on Melbourne's urban fringe. Its purpose was to reconnect a severed historical rail and horse trail, and to mark a civic presence along that highway as an entry to metropolitan Melbourne. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION This design for a bridge asks two questions; first: how can objects of infrastructure be integrated into their physical environment? Second: how can that object activate an interior akin to architectural space? The design unites research fields of architectural design, landscape architecture, urbanism, and engineering. Works of this type often suffer from their hybridity. In contrast, this design brings a consideration of architectural space to a program that is often treated like a road. The project's enveloping mesh skin aimed to capture a relationship with the trees and topography of its surrounding, while also providing a degree of enclosure that could encourage inhabitation. It reconciles the pragmatic infrastructure with a sculptural response to landscape. In turn, this aims to contribute a built civic presence to the environment. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE The project won an Honourable Mention in the 2007 Architecture Australia Unbuilt Prize. Subsequently the project was reworked and exhibited in the Australian Pavilion at the 2008 Venice Architecture Biennale. It has since been presented in public lectures in Melbourne and Kuala Lumpur.

RESEARCH BACKGROUND: Research activity in the architectural disciplines takes place both within and without the academy. Speculative design competitions, are an important platform to engage with the discourse and practice of architecture, where ideas and positions are contested. It facilitates an advanced level of experimentation and venturous practice, that supports other poles of material, spatial and socio-cultural research. The Center for Public Interest Design (CPID) is a research and action centre at Portland State University that aims to investigate, promote, and engage in inclusive design practices that address the growing needs of underserved communities worldwid¬¬e. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION: 'reGENERATION' was an ideas competition intended to facilitate a dialogue on the subject of intergenerational housing. Rather than consider multi-generational housing as an isolated entity, the entry 'Into the Void' considered the provision of housing as an opportunity to explore a new typology of urban development, one that actively learns from and engages with the contemporary city and its pluralistic architecture and urbanism. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: The project was a winning entry and awarded third place by an international panel of experts including Tim Carpenter, Teddy Cruz, Margarette Leite, Dan Pitera, Belinda Tato, and Jose Vallejo. The research places itself in a discourse of ageing population, that is set to a global challenge for cities. This no longer solely limited to demographics but central to the wider debate around social inclusion, employment, economics, education and health. In prototyping urban form, articulating a clear architectural position through testing social interactions and demographic interplays at multiple resolutions and scales, the research aims to address a more inclusive strategy for ageing in place. Weblink: https://www.pdx.edu/public-interest-design/cpid-competition-results

RESEARCH BACKGROUND: Urban Box was one of 4 projects by Iredale Pedersen Hook (IPH) selected for exhibition in the reciprocal international Seoul/Melbourne exhibition, 'Architectural Urbanism' (the others were Sheep House, Grace Park House and Innocent Bystander winery). IPH was one of 10 firms (5 from Melbourne, 5 from Seoul) who participated. RESEARCH CONTRIBUTION: Urban Box is a solid little building in Port Melbourne, an inner-city Melbourne suburb of single-fronted timber Victorian workers cottages, high-rise apartments, public housing and light industry. It is the prototype of a collection of small houses by IPH that uses the insulated concrete sandwich precast panel system, Thermomass. The site is 99m2; the subdivision of an already small piece of land. The house shifts the typology of infill housing towards a responsive and sustainable approach with a sense of material quality. Programmed 'upside-down', the bedrooms and bathrooms are on the ground floor and the living spaces and primary outdoor space upstairs. RESEARCH SIGNIFICANCE: Urban Box was published in Australian Home Beautiful in Feb 2012. Its selection for inclusion in this international event inserts the project into broader intercultural conversation. The exhibition was funded by RMIT and the Korean National University. The project received external support from the Australian Government through the Australian International Cultural Council: an initiative of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade. A reciprocal exhibition, co-curated by Jong-kyu Kim, was subsequently held at RMIT's Design Hub.

dataset_title_etc_main: Stadtplanungsplan Sant Pau de Segúries - März 2008
dataset_expl_etc_main: Le Plan d’urbanisme municipal (POUM) de Sant Pau de Segúries est l’instrument cartographique de l’urbanisme de la municipalité qui dirige le développement du territoire municipal. L’ensemble des informations géographiques du POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries se compose de plans de mise en page multiples, tous au format PDF. Les zones d’aménagement de la commune définies par les plans du POUM sont les suivantes: Classification des terres, Structure des terres (systèmes généraux de communication et espaces libres et installations communautaires), Gestion des terres (secteurs de développement urbain), Notation et protection des terres non urbanisables, protection des terres non urbanisables, Notation et protection des terres urbaines et urbaines, Gestion des terres urbaines. Alignements en hauteur et en profondeur, catalogue du patrimoine architectural en terres non urbanisables, catalogue des biens culturels et présentant un intérêt pour les terrains urbains et les services urbains (réseau d’eau potable, réseau principal d’assainissement, réseau électrique et réseau téléphonique).;El Plan de Ordenación Urbanística Municipal (POUM) de Sant Pau de Segúries es el instrumento cartográfico de planeamiento urbanístico del municipio que dirige el desarrollo del territorio municipal. El conjunto de información geográfica del POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries está formado por múltiples planos de ordenación, todos ellos en formato PDF. Los ámbitos de planeamiento del municipio definidos por los planos del POUM son: Clasificación del suelo, Estructura del suelo (sistemas generales de comunicación y Espacios libres y equipamientos comunitarios), Gestión del suelo (sectores de desarrollo urbanístico), Calificación y protección del suelo no urbanizable , protección del suelo no urbanizable, Calificación y protección del suelo urbano y urbanizable, Ordenación del suelo urbano. Alineaciones alturas y profundidades, Catálogo de patrimonio arquitectónico en suelo no urbanizable, Catálogo de bienes culturales y de interés en suelo urbano y Servicios urbanos (red de agua potable, red principal de saneamiento, red eléctrica y red de telefonía).;Il piano urbanistico comunale (POUM) di Sant Pau de Segúries è lo strumento cartografico di pianificazione urbana del comune che dirige lo sviluppo del territorio comunale. L'insieme delle informazioni geografiche del POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries è costituito da più piani di layout, tutti in formato PDF. Le aree di pianificazione del comune definite dai piani del POUM sono: Classificazione dei terreni, struttura del territorio (sistemi generali di comunicazione e spazi liberi e strutture comunitarie), gestione del territorio (settori di sviluppo urbano), classificazione e protezione dei terreni non urbanizzabili, protezione dei terreni non urbanizzabili, classificazione e protezione dei terreni urbani e urbani, gestione dei terreni urbani. Allineamenti di altezza e profondità, Catalogo del patrimonio architettonico in terreni non urbanizzabili, Catalogo dei beni culturali e di interesse per il territorio urbano e i servizi urbani (rete idrica potabile, rete igienico-sanitaria principale, rete elettrica e rete telefonica).;Planul de urbanism municipal (POUM) din Sant Pau de Segúries este instrumentul cartografic de planificare urbană al municipalității care conduce dezvoltarea teritoriului municipal. Setul de informații geografice ale POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries constă în mai multe planuri de aspect, toate în format PDF. Zonele de planificare ale municipalității definite de planurile POUM sunt: Clasificarea terenurilor, structura terenurilor (sisteme generale de comunicații și spații libere și facilități comunitare), gestionarea terenurilor (sectoarele de dezvoltare urbană), Evaluarea și protecția terenurilor neurbanizabile, protecția terenurilor neurbanizabile, evaluarea și protecția terenurilor urbane și urbane, gestionarea terenurilor urbane. Alinieri de înălțime și adâncime, Catalogul patrimoniului arhitectural în terenuri neurbanizabile, Catalogul bunurilor culturale și de interes pentru terenurile urbane și serviciile urbane (rețeaua de apă potabilă, rețeaua principală de salubrizare, rețeaua electrică și rețeaua de telefonie).;Het stadsplanningsplan (POUM) van Sant Pau de Segúries is het cartografische instrument van de stadsplanning van de gemeente die de ontwikkeling van het gemeentelijk grondgebied aanstuurt. De verzameling geografische informatie van het POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries bestaat uit meerdere lay-outplannen, allemaal in PDF-formaat. De planningsgebieden van de gemeente als omschreven in de plannen van de POUM zijn: Grondclassificatie, Landstructuur (algemene communicatiesystemen en vrije ruimten en gemeenschapsvoorzieningen), Landbeheer (stedelijke ontwikkelingssectoren), Beoordeling en bescherming van niet-stedelijke gronden, bescherming van niet-stedelijk land, Beoordeling en bescherming van stedelijk en stedelijk land, stedelijk grondbeheer. Hoogte- en diepteafstemmingen, Catalogus van het architectonisch erfgoed in niet-stedelijk land, Catalogus van cultuurgoederen en van belang in stedelijke gebieden en stedelijke diensten (drinkwaternetwerk, hoofdnet voor sanitaire voorzieningen, elektriciteitsnet en telefoonnet).;O Plano Municipal de Planeamento Urbano (POUM) de Sant Pau de Segúries é o instrumento cartográfico de planeamento urbano do município que orienta o desenvolvimento do território municipal. O conjunto de informações geográficas do POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries consiste em múltiplos planos de layout, todos em formato PDF. As áreas de planeamento do município definidas pelos planos do POUM são: Classificação dos solos, estrutura dos solos (sistemas de comunicação geral e espaços livres e instalações comunitárias), gestão dos solos (setores de desenvolvimento urbano), classificação e proteção de terrenos não urbanizáveis, proteção de terrenos não urbanizáveis, classificação e proteção dos solos urbanos e urbanos, gestão dos solos urbanos. Alinhamentos de altura e profundidade, Catálogo do património arquitetónico em terrenos não urbanizáveis, Catálogo de bens culturais e de interesse em terrenos urbanos e serviços urbanos (rede de água potável, principal rede de saneamento, rede elétrica e rede telefónica).;Il-Pjan Muniċipali tal-Ippjanar Urban (POUM) ta’ Sant Pau de Segúries huwa l-istrument kartografiku tal-ippjanar urban tal-muniċipalità li jidderieġi l-iżvilupp tat-territorju muniċipali. Is-sett ta’ informazzjoni ġeografika tal-POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries jikkonsisti fi pjanijiet ta’ tqassim multipli, kollha f’format PDF. Iż-żoni tal-ippjanar tal-muniċipalità ddefiniti mill-pjanijiet tal-POUM huma: Klassifikazzjoni tal-art, Struttura tal-art (sistemi ta’ komunikazzjoni ġenerali u spazji ħielsa u faċilitajiet komunitarji), Ġestjoni tal-art (setturi tal-iżvilupp urban), Klassifikazzjoni u protezzjoni ta’ art mhux urbanizzata, protezzjoni ta’ art mhux urbana, Klassifikazzjoni u protezzjoni ta’ art urbana u urbana, Ġestjoni tal-art urbana. Allinjamenti tal-għoli u l-fond, Katalgu tal-wirt arkitettoniku f’art mhux urbanizzata, Katalgu ta’ beni kulturali u ta’ interess fl-art urbana u s-servizzi urbani (netwerk tal-ilma tax-xorb, netwerk ewlieni tas-sanità, netwerk tal-elettriku u netwerk tat-telefon).;El Pla d’Ordenació Urbanística Municipal (POUM) de Sant Pau de Segúries és l'instrument cartogràfic de planejament urbanístic del municipi que dirigeix el desenvolupament del territori municipal. El conjunt d'informació geogràfica del POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries està format per múltiples plànols d'ordenació, tots ells en format PDF. Els àmbits de planejament del municipi definits pels plànols del POUM són: Classificació del sòl, Estructura del sòl (sistemes generals de comunicació i Espais lliures i equipaments comunitaris), Gestió del sòl (sectors de desenvolupament urbanístic), Qualificació i protecció del sòl no urbanitzable, Protecció del sòl no urbanitzable, Qualificació i protecció del sòl urbà i urbanitzable, Ordenació del sòl urbà. Alineacions alçades i fondàries, Catàleg de patrimoni arquitectònic en sòl no urbanitzable, Catàleg de béns culturals i d'interés en sòl urbà i Serveis urbans (xarxa d'aigua potable, xarxa principal de sanejament, xarxa elèctrica i xarxa de telefonia).;Общинският градоустройствен план (POUM) на Sant Pau de Segúries е картографският инструмент за градоустройствено планиране на общината, който ръководи развитието на общинската територия. Наборът от географска информация на POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries се състои от множество планове за оформление, всички във формат PDF. Областите на планиране на общината, определени в плановете на ПОУМ, са: Класификация на земята, структура на земята (общи комуникационни системи и свободни пространства и общностни съоръжения), управление на земите (сектори на градското развитие), оценка и защита на неградски земи, защита на неградски земи, рейтинг и защита на градската и градската земя, управление на градската земя. Изравняване на височината и дълбочината, Каталог на архитектурното наследство в неградски земи, Каталог на движимите културни ценности и представляващи интерес към градската земя и градските услуги (мрежа за питейна вода, основна канализационна мрежа, електрическа мрежа и телефонна мрежа).;Der Stadtplanungsplan (POUM) von Sant Pau de Segúries ist das kartographische Instrument der Stadtplanung der Gemeinde, das die Entwicklung des Gemeindegebiets leitet. Die geographischen Informationen des POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries bestehen aus mehreren Layoutplänen, alle im PDF-Format. Die Planungsgebiete der Gemeinde, die durch die Pläne des POUM definiert sind, sind: Bodenklassifizierung, Bodenstruktur (allgemeine Kommunikationssysteme und Freiräume und Gemeinschaftseinrichtungen), Landbewirtschaftung (städtische Entwicklungssektoren), Bewertung und Schutz nicht-urbanisierbarer Flächen, Schutz nicht-urbanisierbarer Flächen, Bewertung und Schutz städtischer und städtischer Flächen, Stadtbewirtschaftung. Höhen- und Tiefenausrichtung, Katalog des architektonischen Erbes auf nicht urbanisierbaren Grundstücken, Katalog von Kulturgütern und von Interesse an städtischen Grundstücken und städtischen Dienstleistungen (Trinkwassernetz, Haupthygienenetz, Stromnetz und Telefonnetz).
dataset_expl_etc_sub: El Plan de Ordenación Urbanística Municipal (POUM) de Sant Pau de Segúries es el instrumento cartográfico de planeamiento urbanístico del municipio que dirige el desarrollo del territorio municipal. El conjunto de información geográfica del POUM de Sant Pau de Segúries está formado por múltiples planos de ordenación, todos ellos en formato PDF. Los ámbitos de planeamiento del municipio definidos por los planos del POUM son: Clasificación del suelo, Estructura del suelo (sistemas generales de comunicación y Espacios libres y equipamientos comunitarios), Gestión del suelo (sectores de desarrollo urbanístico), Calificación y protección del suelo no urbanizable , protección del suelo no urbanizable, Calificación y protección del suelo urbano y urbanizable, Ordenación del suelo urbano. Alineaciones alturas y profundidades, Catálogo de patrimonio arquitectónico en suelo no urbanizable, Catálogo de bienes culturales y de interés en suelo urbano y Servicios urbanos (red de agua potable, red principal de saneamiento, red eléctrica y red de telefonía).
dataset_kywd_etc_main: Sant Pau de Segúries;Municipio;POUM;Desarrollo urbano;Municipality;Urban development;Municipi;Desenvolupament urbà

dataset_title_etc_main: Data underlying the publication: Synergetic urbanism: a theoretical exploration of a vertical farm as local heat source and flexible electricity user
dataset_expl_etc_main: The urban energy transition requires innovative heating and cooling systems, as well as enhanced flexibility in electricity usage. This paper explores the theoretical potential for vertical farms to contribute to the energy transition by supplying residual heat to local district heat networks and flexible electricity usage. A stepped approach was used to design energy systems that achieve thermal energy balance through heat and cold exchange between a vertical farm and buildings within a specific Dutch neighbourhood. Furthermore, alternative lighting strategies for vertical farms were explored to reduce grid congestion and to respond to electricity price fluctuations, limiting the mismatch between electricity generation and demand. Compared to the baseline scenario, the energy system with an integrated vertical farm reduces overall energy use by 15%, even when accounting for the farm’s electricity use. By adopting intermittent lighting that is better aligned with electricity price fluctuations, the vertical farm obtained annual cost savings of 14%. The integration of vertical farms into energy systems can, therefore, contribute to the urban energy transition by producing residual heat to balance thermal energy system and save money for growers by optimising LED operations to align with electricity price fluctuations, whilst producing fresh vegetables for the city.

dataset_expl_etc_main: El impuesto de desarrollo (TA) se introduce automáticamente en los municipios con un plan de planificación urbana local (PLU) o plan de uso del suelo (POS) y en comunidades urbanas, por deliberación en otros municipios.    El impuesto sobre el desarrollo se aplica a la construcción y construcción, reconstrucción y ampliación de edificios, instalaciones o modificaciones de cualquier tipo sujetos a un régimen de autorización, sujeto a exenciones. Sustituye al Impuesto Local sobre Equipos (TLE), el Impuesto Suplementario al TLE en la región de Île-de-France, el Impuesto Departamental sobre Espacios Naturales y Sensitivos (TDENS), el Impuesto Departamental para la Financiación de Consejos Arquitectónicos, Urbanismo y Medio Ambiente (TDCAUE), el Impuesto Especial sobre Equipos del Departamento de Saboya (TSES) y el Programa Integral de Desarrollo (PAE).   Estos datos se derivan de información obtenida de los municipios de Rennes Métropole (a través del departamento de Derecho Sols, complementado ocasionalmente por urbanistas territoriales) o de gestores de datos, en el estado actual de conocimiento. El atributo «observaciones» disponible en la base de datos especifica la validez de la información. Esta capa contiene datos archivados. L'imposta sullo sviluppo si applica allo sviluppo e alla costruzione, alla ricostruzione e all'ampliamento di edifici, impianti o modifiche di qualsiasi tipo soggetti ad un regime di autorizzazione, soggetti a esenzioni. Sostituisce la tassa sulle attrezzature locali (TLE), l'imposta supplementare alla TLE nella regione dell'Île-de-France, la tassa dipartimentale sugli spazi naturali e sensibili (TDENS), la tassa dipartimentale per il finanziamento dei consigli architettonici, urbanistici e ambientali (TDCAUE), la tassa speciale sulle attrezzature del Dipartimento della Savoia (TSES) e il programma di sviluppo globale (PAE). De ontwikkelingsbelasting is van toepassing op de ontwikkeling en de bouw, de wederopbouw en de uitbreiding van gebouwen, installaties of wijzigingen van welke aard dan ook waarvoor een vergunningsregeling geldt, waarvoor vrijstellingen gelden. Het vervangt de lokale uitrustingsbelasting (TLE), de aanvullende belasting op de TLE in de regio Île-de-France, de Departmental Tax on Natural and Sensitive Spaces (TDENS), de Departmental Tax for the Financing of Architectural, Urban Planning and Environment Councils (TDCAUE), de Special Equipment Tax of the Department of Savoie (TSES) en het Comprehensive Development Programme (PAE).   Deze gegevens zijn afgeleid van informatie afkomstig van de gemeenten Rennes Métropole (via de afdeling Sols Law, soms aangevuld door territoriale stedenbouwkundigen) of van datamanagers, in de huidige stand van kennis. Het kenmerk „observaties” dat beschikbaar is in de database specificeert de geldigheid van de informatie. Deze laag bevat gearchiveerde gegevens. Ze zijn identificeerbaar via het veld met de naam „archief” ingevoerd door „true”. Statybos mokestis taikomas statant ir statant, rekonstruojant ir plečiant bet kokios rūšies pastatus, įrenginius ar rekonstrukcijas, kuriems taikoma leidimų išdavimo tvarka ir kuriems taikomos išimtys. Juo pakeičiamas vietinės įrangos mokestis (TLE), papildomas mokestis prie TLE Il de Franso regione, Departamentinis gamtinių ir jautrių erdvių mokestis (TDENS), Departamentinis mokestis už architektūros, miestų planavimo ir aplinkos tarybų finansavimą (TDCAUE), Savojos departamento specialiosios įrangos mokestis (TSES) ir Išsami plėtros programa (PAE).   Šie duomenys gaunami iš Rennes Métropole savivaldybių (per Sols Law departamentą, kurį kartais papildo teritoriniai miestų planuotojai) arba iš duomenų valdytojų, atsižvelgiant į dabartines žinias. Razvojni davek se uporablja za razvoj in gradnjo, obnovo in širitev stavb, instalacij ali sprememb, za katere velja sistem dovoljenj, ob upoštevanju oprostitev. Nadomešča lokalni davek na opremo (TLE), dodatni davek k TLE v regiji Île-de-France, departmajski davek na naravne in občutljive prostore (TDENS), departmajski davek za financiranje svetov za arhitekturo, urbano načrtovanje in okolje (TDCAUE), davek na posebno opremo oddelka za Savoie (TSES) in celovit razvojni program (PAE).   Ti podatki izhajajo iz informacij, pridobljenih iz občin Rennes Métropole (prek oddelka Sols Law, občasno dopolnjenih s teritorialnimi urbanisti) ali od upravljavcev podatkov v trenutnem stanju znanja. Atribut „opombe“, ki je na voljo v zbirki podatkov, določa veljavnost informacij. Ta sloj vsebuje arhivirane podatke. Prepoznavne so preko polja z imenom „arhiv“, ki ga vnese „resnično“. Razvojni davek (TA) se samodejno uvede v občinah z lokalnim urbanističnim načrtom (PLU) ali načrtom rabe zemljišč (POS) in v mestnih skupnostih z posvetovanjem v drugih občinah.    Razvojni davek se uporablja za razvoj in gradnjo, obnovo in širitev stavb, instalacij ali sprememb, za katere velja sistem dovoljenj, ob upoštevanju oprostitev. Prepoznavne so preko polja z imenom „arhiv“, ki ga vnese „resnično“.;Taxa de dezvoltare (TA) este introdusă automat în municipalități cu un plan de urbanism local (PLU) sau un plan de utilizare a terenurilor (POS) și în comunitățile urbane, prin deliberare în alte municipalități.   Taxa de dezvoltare se aplică dezvoltării și construcției, reconstrucției și extinderii clădirilor, instalațiilor sau modificărilor de orice fel care fac obiectul unui regim de autorizare, sub rezerva scutirilor. Acesta înlocuiește taxa locală pe echipamente (TLE), taxa suplimentară la TLE în regiunea Île-de-France, impozitul departamental pe spațiile naturale și sensibile (TDENS), impozitul departamental pentru finanțarea consiliilor de arhitectură, urbanism și mediu (TDCAUE), impozitul special pe echipamente al Departamentului Savoie (TSES) și Programul de dezvoltare globală (PAE).   Aceste date provin din informațiile preluate de la municipalitățile Rennes Métropole (prin intermediul departamentului de drept Sols, completate ocazional de urbaniști teritoriali) sau de la managerii de date, în stadiul actual al cunoștințelor. Atributul „observații” disponibil în baza de date specifică valabilitatea informațiilor. Acest strat conține date arhivate. Acestea sunt identificabile prin intermediul câmpului numit „arhiv” introdus prin „adevărat”. Acestea sunt identificabile prin intermediul câmpului numit „arhiv” introdus prin „adevărat”.;Attīstības nodoklis (TA) tiek automātiski ieviests pašvaldībās ar vietējo pilsētplānošanas plānu (PLU) vai zemes izmantošanas plānu (POS) un pilsētu kopienās, apspriežoties citās pašvaldībās.   Attīstības nodoklis attiecas uz ēku, iekārtu vai jebkāda veida pārbūves attīstību un būvniecību, rekonstrukciju un paplašināšanu, uz kurām attiecas atļauju sistēma un kuras ir atbrīvotas no nodokļa. Tas aizstāj Vietējo iekārtu nodokli (TLE), TLE papildu nodokli Ildefransas reģionā, departamenta nodokli par dabas un jutīgām telpām (TDENS), departamenta nodokli par arhitektūras, pilsētplānošanas un vides padomju finansēšanu (TDCAUE), Savoie departamenta īpašo iekārtu nodokli (TSES) un Visaptverošo attīstības programmu (PAE).    Šie dati ir iegūti no informācijas, kas iegūta no Rennas Métropole pašvaldībām (ar Sols likuma departamenta starpniecību, ko laiku pa laikam papildina pilsētu plānotāji) vai no datu pārvaldītājiem pašreizējā zināšanu līmenī. Datubāzē pieejamais atribūts “novērojumi” norāda uz informācijas derīgumu. Šis slānis satur arhivētus datus. Tās ir identificējamas, izmantojot lauku ar nosaukumu “arhīvs”, kas ievadīts ar “patiess”.Attīstības nodoklis (TA) tiek automātiski ieviests pašvaldībās ar vietējo pilsētplānošanas plānu (PLU) vai zemes izmantošanas plānu (POS) un pilsētu kopienās, apspriežoties citās pašvaldībās.    Attīstības nodoklis attiecas uz ēku, iekārtu vai jebkāda veida pārbūves attīstību un būvniecību, rekonstrukciju un paplašināšanu, uz kurām attiecas atļauju sistēma un kuras ir atbrīvotas no nodokļa. Tas aizstāj Vietējo iekārtu nodokli (TLE), TLE papildu nodokli Ildefransas reģionā, departamenta nodokli par dabas un jutīgām telpām (TDENS), departamenta nodokli par arhitektūras, pilsētplānošanas un vides padomju finansēšanu (TDCAUE), Savoie departamenta īpašo iekārtu nodokli (TSES) un Visaptverošo attīstības programmu (PAE).     Šie dati ir iegūti no informācijas, kas iegūta no Rennas Métropole pašvaldībām (ar Sols likuma departamenta starpniecību, ko laiku pa laikam papildina pilsētu plānotāji) vai no datu pārvaldītājiem pašreizējā zināšanu līmenī. Datubāzē pieejamais atribūts “novērojumi” norāda uz informācijas derīgumu.   Šis slānis satur arhivētus datus. Tās ir identificējamas, izmantojot lauku ar nosaukumu “arhīvs”, kas ievadīts ar “patiess”.;La taxe d’aménagement (TA) est instituée de plein droit dans les communes dotées d’un plan local d’urbanisme (PLU) ou d’un plan d’occupation des sols (POS) et dans les communautés urbaines, par délibération dans les autres communes.      La taxe d’aménagement s’applique aux opérations d'aménagement et aux opérations de construction, de reconstruction et d'agrandissement des bâtiments, installations ou aménagements de toute nature soumises à un régime d'autorisation, sous réserve des exonérations. Elle se substitue à la taxe locale d’équipement (TLE), à la taxe complémentaire à la TLE en région Île-de-France, à la taxe départementale des espaces naturels et sensibles (TDENS), à la taxe départementale destinée au financement des conseils d’architecture, d’urbanisme et de l’environnement(TDCAUE), à la taxe spéciale d’équipement du département de la Savoie (TSES) et au programme d’aménagement d’ensemble (PAE).      Cette donnée est issue des informations récupérées auprès des communes de Rennes Métropole (via le service Droit des Sols, complétée ponctuellement par les référents urbanistes territoriaux) ou auprès des gestionnaires de la données, en l'état actuel des connaissances. L'attribut \observations\ disponible dans la base de données précise la validité de l'information.   Cette couche contient des données archivées. Elles sont identifiables via le champ nommé \archive\ renseigné par \vrai\.;It-taxxa fuq l-iżvilupp (TA) tiġi introdotta awtomatikament fil-muniċipalitajiet bi pjan ta’ ppjanar urban lokali (PLU) jew bi pjan tal-użu tal-art (POS) u f’komunitajiet urbani, permezz ta’ deliberazzjoni f’muniċipalitajiet oħra.   It-taxxa fuq l-iżvilupp tapplika għall-iżvilupp u l-kostruzzjoni, ir-rikostruzzjoni u l-espansjoni ta’ bini, installazzjonijiet jew alterazzjonijiet ta’ kwalunkwe tip soġġetti għal skema ta’ awtorizzazzjoni, soġġetta għal eżenzjonijiet. Hija tissostitwixxi t-Taxxa fuq it-Tagħmir Lokali (TLE), it-Taxxa Supplimentari għat-TLE fir-reġjun ta’ Île-de-France, it-Taxxa Dipartimentali fuq l-Ispazji Naturali u Sensittivi (TDENS), it-Taxxa Dipartimentali għall-Finanzjament tal-Kunsilli Arkitettoniċi, tal-Ippjanar Urban u tal-Ambjent (TDCAUE), it-Taxxa fuq it-Tagħmir Speċjali tad-Dipartiment ta’ Savoie (TSES) u l-Programm ta’ Żvilupp Komprensiv (PAE).   Din id-data hija derivata minn informazzjoni miksuba mill-muniċipalitajiet ta’ Rennes Métropole (permezz tad-dipartiment tal-Liġi Sols, issupplimentata kultant minn pjanifikaturi urbani territorjali) jew minn maniġers tad-data, fl-istat attwali tal-għarfien. l-attribut “osservazzjonijiet” disponibbli fil-bażi tad-data jispeċifika l-validità tal-informazzjoni.  Dan is-saff fih data arkivjata. Huma identifikabbli permezz tal-qasam bl-isem “arkiv” imdaħħal minn “veru”.
dataset_expl_etc_sub: L'imposta sullo sviluppo (TA) viene introdotta automaticamente nei comuni con un piano di pianificazione urbana locale (PLU) o piano di uso del suolo (POS) e nelle comunità urbane, per deliberazione in altri comuni.    L'imposta sullo sviluppo si applica allo sviluppo e alla costruzione, alla ricostruzione e all'ampliamento di edifici, impianti o modifiche di qualsiasi tipo soggetti ad un regime di autorizzazione, soggetti a esenzioni. Sostituisce la tassa sulle attrezzature locali (TLE), l'imposta supplementare alla TLE nella regione dell'Île-de-France, la tassa dipartimentale sugli spazi naturali e sensibili (TDENS), la tassa dipartimentale per il finanziamento dei consigli architettonici, urbanistici e ambientali (TDCAUE), la tassa speciale sulle attrezzature del Dipartimento della Savoia (TSES) e il programma di sviluppo globale (PAE).   Questi dati sono ricavati da informazioni recuperate dai comuni di Rennes Métropole (attraverso il dipartimento Legge Sols, occasionalmente integrato da urbanisti territoriali) o dai responsabili dei dati, nello stato attuale delle conoscenze. L'attributo \osservazioni\ disponibile nella banca dati specifica la validità delle informazioni. Questo livello contiene dati archiviati. Sono identificabili attraverso il campo denominato \archivio\ inserito da \vero\.L'imposta sullo sviluppo (TA) viene introdotta automaticamente nei comuni con un piano di pianificazione urbana locale (PLU) o piano di uso del suolo (POS) e nelle comunità urbane, per deliberazione in altri comuni. dataset_title_etc_main: Potenzialindikatoren für den Zugang zu Solarenergie in der Stadtplanung - Messungen der Solarversorgung simuliert für Stadtplanung und Fallstudien
dataset_expl_etc_main: Les données contiennent les résultats d’une étude qui a analysé des mesures montrant les paramètres de l’approvisionnement en énergie solaire à des fins d’urbanisme. L’objectif était d’évaluer les corrélations entre les indicateurs de valeur afin de trouver des indicateurs simples appropriés de performance solaire qui peuvent être utilisés pour évaluer la conception urbaine.  Les données contiennent des entrées pour créer des désignations de blocs et de métriques en tant que sorties de simulations. Les modèles à quartz ont été créés avec Rhino 7 et Grasshopper, tandis que les valeurs de mesure ont été simulées avec Grasshopper et Ladybug Tools.  Les métriques sont décrites dans l’article de revue: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Métriques de performance solaire dans l’urbanisme: Une revue et une taxinomie. Dans les bâtiments (no 393; Vol. 12, numéro 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  Le modèle est décrit dans l’article: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters et Maria Wall. 2022. «Identifier les indicateurs potentiels de l’accès solaire de voisinage dans l’urbanisme» Bâtiments 12, no 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575  Le fichier Excel se compose de cinq fiches techniques: deux contenant la description des données et trois contenant des données de recherche. Les résultats sont des mesures d’approvisionnement solaire, qui ont été utilisées dans une étude de corrélation et d’autres analyses statistiques pour déterminer leur adéquation à l’évaluation de la planification urbaine.  Feuille 1 ‘Descriptions_métriques’: Description des valeurs de mesure  Lame 2 «têtes»: Description des rubriques  Feuille 3 «Iterations_Stockholm»: Les modèles voisins générés dans un processus itératif avec des limitations géométriques ont été simulés pour obtenir plusieurs mesures pour l’alimentation solaire, dans l’hypothèse du climat de Stockholm.  Feuille 4 ‘Iterations_Francfort’: Les mêmes modèles de quartier générés dans un processus itératif avec des limitations géométriques ont été simulés pour obtenir de multiples mesures d’alimentation solaire, en supposant le climat de Francfort.  Feuille 5 «Fall studies_Frankfurt»: Des études de cas de quartiers réels de la ville de Malmö ont été simulées pour obtenir plusieurs mesures pour l’approvisionnement solaire, dans l’hypothèse du climat de Francfort. Ces ensembles de données métriques ont été utilisés à des fins de validation.   Les données sont disponibles au format xlsx et csv.;Τα δεδομένα περιέχουν αποτελέσματα από μια μελέτη που ανέλυσε μετρήσεις που δείχνουν μετρήσεις παροχής ηλιακής ενέργειας για πολεοδομικούς σκοπούς. Ο στόχος ήταν να αξιολογηθούν οι συσχετίσεις μεταξύ δεικτών αξίας για να βρεθούν οι κατάλληλοι απλοί δείκτες ηλιακής απόδοσης που μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για την αξιολόγηση του αστικού σχεδιασμού.   Τα δεδομένα περιέχουν εισόδους για τη δημιουργία σχεδιασμών μπλοκ και μετρήσεων ως εξόδους από προσομοιώσεις. Τα μοντέλα χαλαζία δημιουργήθηκαν με Rhino 7 και Grasshopper, ενώ οι τιμές μέτρησης προσομοιώθηκαν με Grasshopper και Ladybug Tools.  Οι μετρήσεις περιγράφονται στο άρθρο αναθεώρησης: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Μετρήσεις Ηλιακής Απόδοσης στον Πολεοδομικό Σχεδιασμό: Αναθεώρηση και ταξινομία. Σε κτίρια (αριθ. 393· Τόμος 12, Τεύχος 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  Το μοντέλο περιγράφεται στο άρθρο: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters, και Maria Wall. 2022. «Προσδιορισμός των πιθανών δεικτών της ηλιακής πρόσβασης γειτονίας στον πολεοδομικό σχεδιασμό» Κτίρια 12, αρ. 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Το αρχείο Excel αποτελείται από πέντε φύλλα δεδομένων: δύο που περιέχουν περιγραφή δεδομένων και τρία που περιέχουν ερευνητικά δεδομένα. Τα αποτελέσματα είναι μετρήσεις ηλιακής προσφοράς, οι οποίες χρησιμοποιήθηκαν σε μελέτη συσχέτισης και άλλες στατιστικές αναλύσεις για τον προσδιορισμό της καταλληλότητάς τους για την αξιολόγηση του πολεοδομικού σχεδιασμού.   Φύλλο 1 «metric_descriptions»: Περιγραφή των τιμών μέτρησης   Λεπίδα 2 «κλάσεις»: Περιγραφή των επικεφαλίδων   Φύλλο 3 «Iterations_Stockholm»: Τα γειτονικά μοντέλα που δημιουργήθηκαν σε μια επαναληπτική διαδικασία με γεωμετρικούς περιορισμούς προσομοιώθηκαν για να λάβουν διάφορες μετρήσεις για την παροχή ηλιακής ενέργειας, υπό την προϋπόθεση του κλίματος της Στοκχόλμης.   Φύλλο 4 «Iterations_Frankfurt»: Τα ίδια μοντέλα γειτονίας που δημιουργήθηκαν σε μια επαναληπτική διαδικασία με γεωμετρικούς περιορισμούς προσομοιώθηκαν για να λάβουν πολλαπλές μετρήσεις ηλιακής τροφοδοσίας, υποθέτοντας το κλίμα της Φρανκφούρτης.   Φύλλο 5 «Fall studies_Frankfurt»: Οι περιπτωσιολογικές μελέτες πραγματικών περιοχών από την πόλη του Malmö προσομοιώθηκαν για να ληφθούν διάφορες μετρήσεις για την παροχή ηλιακής ενέργειας, υπό την προϋπόθεση του κλίματος της Φρανκφούρτης. Αυτά τα μετρικά σύνολα δεδομένων χρησιμοποιήθηκαν για σκοπούς επικύρωσης.   Τα δεδομένα είναι διαθέσιμα σε μορφή xlsx και csv.;I dati contengono i risultati di uno studio che ha analizzato metriche che mostrano metriche di approvvigionamento di energia solare per scopi di pianificazione urbana. L'obiettivo era quello di valutare le correlazioni tra indicatori di valore per trovare indicatori semplici adatti di prestazione solare che possano essere utilizzati per valutare la progettazione urbana.  I dati contengono input per creare designiterazioni di blocchi e metriche come output da simulazioni. I modelli al quarzo sono stati creati con Rhino 7 e Grasshopper, mentre i valori di misura sono stati simulati con Grasshopper e Ladybug Tools.   Le metriche sono descritte nell'articolo di revisione: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Metriche di prestazione solare nella pianificazione urbana: Una recensione e tassonomia. Negli edifici (n. 393; Vol. 12, numero 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393   Il modello è descritto nell'articolo: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters e Maria Wall. 2022. \Identificare i potenziali indicatori dell'accesso solare di vicinato nella pianificazione urbana\ Edifici 12, n. 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Il file Excel è composto da cinque schede tecniche: due contenenti la descrizione dei dati e tre contenenti dati di ricerca. I risultati sono metriche di approvvigionamento solare, che sono state utilizzate in uno studio di correlazione e in altre analisi statistiche per determinare la loro idoneità alla valutazione della pianificazione urbana.   Foglio 1 \metric_descriptions\: Descrizione dei valori di misura   Blade 2 \voci\: Descrizione delle rubriche   Scheda 3 \Iterations_Stoccolma\: I modelli vicini generati in un processo iterativo con limitazioni geometriche sono stati simulati per ottenere diverse misurazioni per l'approvvigionamento solare, con l'ipotesi del clima di Stoccolma.   Foglio 4 \Iterazioni_Francoforte\: Gli stessi modelli di quartiere generati in un processo iterativo con limitazioni geometriche sono stati simulati per ottenere più misurazioni dell'approvvigionamento solare, ipotizzando il clima di Francoforte.   Scheda 5 \Tutti gli studi_Francoforte\: Casi di studio di quartieri reali della città di Malmö sono stati simulati per ottenere diverse misurazioni per l'approvvigionamento solare, con l'ipotesi del clima di Francoforte. Questi set di dati metrici sono stati utilizzati a fini di convalida.   I dati sono disponibili in formato xlsx e csv.;De gegevens bevatten resultaten van een studie die metrics analyseerde die de metrics van de levering van zonne-energie voor stedelijke planningsdoeleinden toonden. Het doel was om correlaties tussen waarde-indicatoren te evalueren om geschikte eenvoudige indicatoren van zonneprestaties te vinden die kunnen worden gebruikt om stedelijk ontwerp te beoordelen.   De gegevens bevatten inputs om ontwerpiteraties te maken van blokken en statistieken als outputs van simulaties. Quartz modellen werden gemaakt met Rhino 7 en Grasshopper, terwijl meetwaarden werden gesimuleerd met Grasshopper en Ladybug Tools.  Statistieken worden beschreven in het review artikel: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Zonneprestatie Metrics in stedelijke planning: Een review en taxonomie. In gebouwen (nr. 393; Deel 12, nummer 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  Het model wordt beschreven in het artikel: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters en Maria Wall. 2022. „Het identificeren van potentiële indicatoren van de toegang tot de nabuurschap op zonne-energie in de stedelijke planning” Gebouwen 12, nr. 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Het Excel-bestand bestaat uit vijf datasheets: twee met een beschrijving van de gegevens en drie met onderzoeksgegevens. De resultaten zijn zonneleveringsstatistieken, die werden gebruikt in een correlatieonderzoek en andere statistische analyses om hun geschiktheid voor stedelijke planningsbeoordeling te bepalen.   Blad 1 „metric_descriptions”: Beschrijving van de meetwaarden   Blad 2 „rubrieken”: Beschrijving van de rubrieken   Blad 3 „Iterations_Stockholm”: Naburige modellen gegenereerd in een iteratief proces met geometrische beperkingen werden gesimuleerd om verschillende metingen voor zonnetoevoer te verkrijgen, onder de aanname van het klimaat van Stockholm.   Blad 4 „Iterations_Frankfurt”: Dezelfde buurtmodellen die werden gegenereerd in een iteratief proces met geometrische beperkingen werden gesimuleerd om meerdere metingen van de zonnetoevoer te verkrijgen, uitgaande van het klimaat van Frankfurt.   Blad 5 „Fall studies_Frankfurt”: Casestudy’s van echte districten uit de stad Malmö werden gesimuleerd om verschillende metingen voor de levering van zonne-energie te verkrijgen, in de aanname van het klimaat van Frankfurt. Deze metrische datasets werden gebruikt voor validatiedoeleinden.   De gegevens zijn beschikbaar in xlsx en csv formaat.;Los datos contienen resultados de un estudio que analizó métricas que muestran métricas de suministro de energía solar para fines de planificación urbana. El objetivo fue evaluar las correlaciones entre los indicadores de valor para encontrar indicadores simples adecuados de rendimiento solar que puedan utilizarse para evaluar el diseño urbano.   Los datos contienen entradas para crear designiteraciones de bloques y métricas como salidas de simulaciones. Los modelos de cuarzo se crearon con Rhino 7 y Grasshopper, mientras que los valores de medición se simularon con Grasshopper y Ladybug Tools.  Las métricas se describen en el artículo de revisión: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Métricas de rendimiento solar en planificación urbana: Una revisión y taxonomía. En Edificios (N.º 393; Vol. 12, número 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  El modelo se describe en el artículo: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters y Maria Wall. 2022. «Identificación de posibles indicadores de acceso solar de la vecindad en la planificación urbana» Edificios 12, n.º 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   El archivo Excel consta de cinco hojas de datos: dos que contienen descripción de datos y tres que contienen datos de investigación. Los resultados son métricas de suministro solar, que se utilizaron en un estudio de correlación y otros análisis estadísticos para determinar su idoneidad para la evaluación de la planificación urbana.   Hoja 1 «metric_descriptions»: Descripción de los valores de medición   Hoja 2 ‘cabezas’: Descripción de las partidas   Hoja 3 «Iteraciones_Estocolmo»: Los modelos vecinos generados en un proceso iterativo con limitaciones geométricas fueron simulados para obtener varias mediciones para el suministro solar, bajo el supuesto del clima de Estocolmo.   Hoja 4 «Iteraciones_Frankfurt»: Los mismos modelos de barrio generados en un proceso iterativo con limitaciones geométricas fueron simulados para obtener múltiples mediciones de suministro solar, asumiendo el clima de Frankfurt.   Hoja 5 «Estudios de otoño_Frankfurt»: Se simularon estudios de casos de distritos reales de la ciudad de Malmö para obtener varias mediciones para el suministro solar, bajo el supuesto del clima de Frankfurt. Estos conjuntos de datos métricos se utilizaron con fines de validación.   Los datos están disponibles en formato xlsx y csv.;Tá torthaí sna sonraí ó staidéar ina ndearnadh anailís ar mhéadracht a léiríonn méadracht soláthair fuinnimh gréine chun críocha pleanála uirbí. Ba é an aidhm a bhí leis meastóireacht a dhéanamh ar chomhghaolta idir táscairí luacha chun táscairí simplí oiriúnacha a aimsiú maidir le feidhmíocht ghréine is féidir a úsáid chun dearadh uirbeach a mheasúnú.  Tá ionchuir sna sonraí chun dearadh na mbloc agus na méadrachta a chruthú mar aschuir ó ionsamhlúcháin. Cruthaíodh samhlacha Grianchloch le Rhino 7 agus Grasshopper, agus insamhladh luachanna tomhais le Grasshopper agus Ladybug Tools.   Déantar cur síos ar mhéadracht san airteagal athbhreithnithe:Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Méadracht Feidhmíochta Gréine sa Phleanáil Uirbeach: Athbhreithniú agus Tacsanomaíocht.I bhFoirgnimh (Uimh. 393; Imleabhar 12, Eagrán 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393   Déantar cur síos ar an tsamhail san airteagal: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters, agus Maria Wall. 2022.“Táscairí féideartha rochtana gréine comharsanachta i bpleanáil uirbeach a shainaithint” Foirgnimh 12, uimh. 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Tá cúig bhileog sonraí sa chomhad Excel: dhá cheann ina bhfuil tuairisc ar shonraí agus trí cinn ina bhfuil sonraí taighde. Is méadrachtaí soláthair gréine iad na torthaí, a úsáideadh i staidéar comhghaoil agus in anailísí staitistiúla eile chun a n-oiriúnacht do mheasúnú pleanála uirbí a chinneadh.   Bileog 1 ‘tuairiscí méadracha’: Tuairisc ar na luachanna tomhais   ‘Ceannteidil’ lann 2: Tuairisc ar na ceannteidil   Bileog 3 ‘Iterations_Stockholm’: Rinneadh samhlacha comharsanachta a gineadh i bpróiseas atriallach le teorainneacha geoiméadracha a ionsamhlú chun roinnt tomhas a fháil maidir le soláthar gréine, faoi thoimhde aeráid Stócólm.   Bileog 4 ‘Aistriúcháin_Frankfurt’: Rinneadh na samhlacha comharsanachta céanna a gineadh i bpróiseas atriallach le teorainneacha geoiméadracha a ionsamhlú chun iliomad tomhas soláthair gréine a fháil, ag glacadh leis go bhfuil aeráid Frankfurt ann.   Bileog 5 ‘Na staidéir uile_Frankfurt’: Rinneadh cás-staidéir ar fhíorcheantair ó chathair Malmö a ionsamhlú chun roinnt tomhas a fháil do sholáthar na gréine, faoin toimhde go mbeidh aeráid Frankfurt ann. Baineadh úsáid as na tacair sonraí mhéadracha sin chun críocha bailíochtaithe.   Tá na sonraí ar fáil i bhformáid xlsx agus csv.;Datele conțin rezultate dintr-un studiu care a analizat metrici care arată indicatorii de alimentare cu energie solară în scopuri de planificare urbană. Scopul a fost de a evalua corelațiile dintre indicatorii de valoare pentru a găsi indicatori simpli adecvați de performanță solară care să poată fi utilizați pentru a evalua proiectarea urbană.   Datele conțin intrări pentru a crea proiectiterări ale blocurilor și metricilor ca ieșiri din simulări. Modelele de cuarț au fost create cu Rhino 7 și Grasshopper, în timp ce valorile de măsurare au fost simulate cu Grasshopper și Ladybug Tools.  Valorile sunt descrise în articolul de revizuire: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Măsurarea performanței solare în urbanism: O revizuire și taxonomie. În clădiri (nr. 393; Vol. 12, numărul 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  Modelul este descris în articol: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters și Maria Wall. 2022. „Identificarea indicatorilor potențiali ai accesului solar al vecinătății în planificarea urbană” Clădirile 12, nr. 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Fișierul Excel este format din cinci fișe de date: două care conțin descrierea datelor și trei care conțin date de cercetare. Rezultatele sunt indicatori de alimentare cu energie solară, care au fost utilizați într-un studiu de corelație și alte analize statistice pentru a determina adecvarea acestora pentru evaluarea planificării urbane.   Fișa 1 „Descrieri_metrice”: Descrierea valorilor măsurate   „Poziții” lama 2: Descrierea rubricilor   Fișa 3 „Iterations_Stockholm”: Modelele vecine generate într-un proces iterativ cu limitări geometrice au fost simulate pentru a obține mai multe măsurători pentru alimentarea cu energie solară, sub ipoteza climatului Stockholm.   Fișa 4 „Iterations_Frankfurt”: Aceleași modele de cartier generate într-un proces iterativ cu limitări geometrice au fost simulate pentru a obține mai multe măsurători de alimentare cu energie solară, presupunând climatul din Frankfurt.   Fișa 5 „Studii de toamnă_Frankfurt”: Studiile de caz privind cartierele reale din orașul Malmö au fost simulate pentru a obține mai multe măsurători pentru alimentarea cu energie solară, sub ipoteza climatului din Frankfurt. Aceste seturi de date metrice au fost utilizate în scopuri de validare.   Datele sunt disponibile în format xlsx și csv.;Die Daten enthalten Ergebnisse einer Studie, in der Metriken analysiert wurden, die Messgrößen für die Solarenergieversorgung für städtebauliche Zwecke zeigen. Ziel war es, Korrelationen zwischen Wertindikatoren zu evaluieren, um geeignete einfache Indikatoren für die Solarleistung zu finden, die zur Bewertung des Stadtdesigns verwendet werden können.   Die Daten enthalten Eingaben, um Bemessungen von Blöcken und Metriken als Ausgänge aus Simulationen zu erstellen. Quarzmodelle wurden mit Rhino 7 und Grasshopper erstellt, während Messwerte mit Grasshopper und Ladybug Tools simuliert wurden.  Metriken werden im Review-Artikel beschrieben: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Solarleistungsmetriken in der Stadtplanung: Eine Überprüfung und Taxonomie. In Gebäuden (Nr. 393; Bd. 12, Ausgabe 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  Das Modell ist im Artikel beschrieben: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters und Maria Wall. 2022. „Identification Potential Indicators of Neighbourhood Solar Access in Urban Planning“ Gebäude 12, Nr. 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Die Excel-Datei besteht aus fünf Datenblättern: zwei mit Datenbeschreibung und drei mit Forschungsdaten. Die Ergebnisse sind Solarversorgungsmetriken, die in einer Korrelationsstudie und anderen statistischen Analysen verwendet wurden, um deren Eignung für die städtebauliche Bewertung zu ermitteln.   Blatt 1 ‚metric_descriptions‘: Beschreibung der Messwerte   Klinge 2 „Positionen“: Beschreibung der Positionen   Blatt 3 ‚Iterationen_Stockholm‘: Benachbarte Modelle, die in einem iterativen Prozess mit geometrischen Einschränkungen erzeugt wurden, wurden simuliert, um unter der Annahme des Stockholmer Klimas mehrere Messungen für die Sonnenversorgung zu erhalten.   Blatt 4 ‚Iterations_Frankfurt‘: Die gleichen Nachbarschaftsmodelle, die in einem iterativen Prozess mit geometrischen Einschränkungen erzeugt wurden, wurden simuliert, um unter der Annahme des Frankfurter Klimas mehrere Sonnenversorgungsmessungen zu erhalten.   Blatt 5 ‚Fallstudien_Frankfurt‘: Fallstudien von realen Stadtteilen aus der Stadt Malmö wurden simuliert, um unter der Annahme des Frankfurter Klimas mehrere Messungen für die Sonnenversorgung zu erhalten. Diese metrischen Datensätze wurden zu Validierungszwecken verwendet.   Die Daten sind im xlsx- und csv-Format verfügbar.;Данните съдържат резултати от проучване, което анализира показатели, показващи показатели за доставка на слънчева енергия за целите на градоустройството. Целта беше да се оценят взаимовръзките между показателите за стойност, за да се намерят подходящи прости показатели за слънчевите показатели, които могат да се използват за оценка на градското проектиране.  Данните съдържат входове за създаване на дизайни на блокове и показатели като изходи от симулации. Кварцовите модели са създадени с Rhino 7 и Grasshopper, докато измерените стойности са симулирани с Grasshopper и Ladybug Tools.  Показателите са описани в статията за преглед: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022 г.). Слънчева производителност в градоустройственото планиране: Преглед и таксономия. В сгради (№ 393; Том 12, брой 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  Моделът е описан в статията: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters и Maria Wall. 2022. „Идентифициране на потенциални показатели за достъп до слънчева енергия в съседство в градоустройственото планиране“ Сгради 12, № 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575  Файлът Excel се състои от пет информационни листа: две, съдържащи описание на данните и три, съдържащи данни от изследвания. Резултатите са показатели за снабдяване със слънчева енергия, които са използвани в изследване на корелацията и други статистически анализи, за да се определи тяхната пригодност за оценка на градоустройственото планиране.  Лист 1 „metric_descriptions“: Описание на измерените стойности  Острие 2 „позиции“: Описание на заглавията  Лист 3 „Iterations_Stockholm“: Съседните модели, генерирани в повтарящ се процес с геометрични ограничения, са симулирани, за да се получат няколко измервания за слънчево захранване, при предположението за Стокхолмския климат.  Лист 4 „Iterations_Frankfurt“: Същите квартални модели, генерирани в повтарящ се процес с геометрични ограничения, са симулирани, за да се получат множество измервания на слънчевата енергия, като се приеме климатът на Франкфурт.  Лист 5 „Fall studies_Frankfurt“: Примери за реални райони от град Малмьо са симулирани, за да се получат няколко измервания за снабдяване със слънчева енергия, при предположението за климата във Франкфурт. Тези набори от метрични данни бяха използвани за целите на валидирането.   Данните са достъпни във формат xlsx и csv.;Az adatok egy olyan tanulmány eredményeit tartalmazzák, amely a napenergia-ellátás mérőszámait várostervezési célokra elemezte. A cél az értékmutatók közötti korrelációk értékelése volt annak érdekében, hogy megfelelő, egyszerű napteljesítmény-mutatókat találjanak, amelyek felhasználhatók a várostervezés értékelésére.  Az adatok olyan bemeneteket tartalmaznak, amelyek a szimulációk kimeneteként blokkok és mérőszámok tervezését teszik lehetővé. A kvarc modelleket Rhino 7-tel és Grasshopperrel készítették, míg a mérési értékeket Grasshopper és katicabogár eszközökkel szimulálták.   A mutatókat a felülvizsgálati cikk ismerteti:Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Napelemes teljesítménymérők a várostervezésben: Felülvizsgálat és taxonómia.Épületekben (393. sz.; 12. kötet, 4. szám. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393   A modell leírása a cikkben található: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters és Maria Wall. 2022. „A szomszédság napenergiához való hozzáférésére vonatkozó potenciálmutatók azonosítása a várostervezésben” 12. épület, 10. sz.: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Az Excel-fájl öt adatlapból áll: kettő adatleírást és három kutatási adatot tartalmaz. Az eredmények napenergia-ellátási mérőszámok, amelyeket korrelációs tanulmányban és más statisztikai elemzésekben használtak a várostervezési értékelésre való alkalmasságuk meghatározásához.   „Metric_descriptions” 1. adatlap: A mérési értékek leírása   2. penge’fejek’: A címsorok leírása   „Iterations_Stockholm” 3. adatlap: A geometriai korlátokkal rendelkező iteratív folyamat során előállított szomszédos modelleket szimulálták, hogy a stockholmi éghajlat feltételezése mellett több mérést lehessen végezni a napenergia ellátására vonatkozóan.   „Iterations_Frankfurt” című 4. lap: A geometriai korlátokkal rendelkező iteratív folyamat során előállított azonos szomszédsági modelleket szimulálták, hogy több napenergia-ellátó mérést végezzenek Frankfurt éghajlatát feltételezve.   5. adatlap „Ősvizsgálatok_Frankfurt”: Malmö város valós kerületeinek esettanulmányait szimulálták, hogy a frankfurti éghajlat feltételezése mellett több mérést végezzenek napenergia-ellátásra vonatkozóan. Ezeket a metrikus adatkészleteket validálási célokra használták.   Az adatok xlsx és csv formátumban érhetők el.
dataset_expl_etc_sub: Τα δεδομένα περιέχουν αποτελέσματα από μια μελέτη που ανέλυσε μετρήσεις που δείχνουν μετρήσεις παροχής ηλιακής ενέργειας για πολεοδομικούς σκοπούς. Ο στόχος ήταν να αξιολογηθούν οι συσχετίσεις μεταξύ δεικτών αξίας για να βρεθούν οι κατάλληλοι απλοί δείκτες ηλιακής απόδοσης που μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για την αξιολόγηση του αστικού σχεδιασμού.   Τα δεδομένα περιέχουν εισόδους για τη δημιουργία σχεδιασμών μπλοκ και μετρήσεων ως εξόδους από προσομοιώσεις. Τα μοντέλα χαλαζία δημιουργήθηκαν με Rhino 7 και Grasshopper, ενώ οι τιμές μέτρησης προσομοιώθηκαν με Grasshopper και Ladybug Tools.  Οι μετρήσεις περιγράφονται στο άρθρο αναθεώρησης: Czachura, A., Kanters, J., Gentile, N., & Wall, M. (2022). Μετρήσεις Ηλιακής Απόδοσης στον Πολεοδομικό Σχεδιασμό: Αναθεώρηση και ταξινομία. Σε κτίρια (αριθ. 393· Τόμος 12, Τεύχος 4). https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12040393  Το μοντέλο περιγράφεται στο άρθρο: Czachura, Agnieszka, Niko Gentile, Jouri Kanters, και Maria Wall. 2022. «Προσδιορισμός των πιθανών δεικτών της ηλιακής πρόσβασης γειτονίας στον πολεοδομικό σχεδιασμό» Κτίρια 12, αρ. 10: 1575. https://doi.org/10.3390/buildings12101575   Το αρχείο Excel αποτελείται από πέντε φύλλα δεδομένων: δύο που περιέχουν περιγραφή δεδομένων και τρία που περιέχουν ερευνητικά δεδομένα. Τα αποτελέσματα είναι μετρήσεις ηλιακής προσφοράς, οι οποίες χρησιμοποιήθηκαν σε μελέτη συσχέτισης και άλλες στατιστικές αναλύσεις για τον προσδιορισμό της καταλληλότητάς τους για την αξιολόγηση του πολεοδομικού σχεδιασμού.   Φύλλο 1 «metric_descriptions»: Περιγραφή των τιμών μέτρησης   Λεπίδα 2 «κλάσεις»: Περιγραφή των επικεφαλίδων   Φύλλο 3 «Iterations_Stockholm»: Τα γειτονικά μοντέλα που δημιουργήθηκαν σε μια επαναληπτική διαδικασία με γεωμετρικούς περιορισμούς προσομοιώθηκαν για να λάβουν διάφορες μετρήσεις για την παροχή ηλιακής ενέργειας, υπό την προϋπόθεση του κλίματος της Στοκχόλμης.   Φύλλο 4 «Iterations_Frankfurt»: Τα ίδια μοντέλα γειτονίας που δημιουργήθηκαν σε μια επαναληπτική διαδικασία με γεωμετρικούς περιορισμούς προσομοιώθηκαν για να λάβουν πολλαπλές μετρήσεις ηλιακής τροφοδοσίας, υποθέτοντας το κλίμα της Φρανκφούρτης.   Φύλλο 5 «Fall studies_Frankfurt»: Οι περιπτωσιολογικές μελέτες πραγματικών περιοχών από την πόλη του Malmö προσομοιώθηκαν για να ληφθούν διάφορες μετρήσεις για την παροχή ηλιακής ενέργειας, υπό την προϋπόθεση του κλίματος της Φρανκφούρτης. Αυτά τα μετρικά σύνολα δεδομένων χρησιμοποιήθηκαν για σκοπούς επικύρωσης.   Τα δεδομένα είναι διαθέσιμα σε μορφή xlsx και csv.

dataset_title_etc_main: Data underlying the publication: The role of urban manufacturing for a circular economy in cities
dataset_expl_etc_main:
This dataset contains the results of a paper publishing in the journal Sustainability titled \The role of urban manufacturing for a circular economy in cities\, which conducted a literature review and expert interviews to identify the drivers and barriers for circular urban manufacturing. The results includes the following files:

  • Interview transcripts.docx - Transcripts of interviews with 8 experts
  • Interviews summary and coding.xlsx - Summary and categorization of drivers and barriers mentioned during expert interviews
  • LCAs of urban manufacturing_summary.xlsx - Summary of results for literature review of LCA papers on localizing manufacturing
  • Literature summary and coding.xlsx - Summary and categorization of drivers and barriers mentioned in literature

dataset_expl_etc_main: Ai sensi del Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) (Scozia) Act 1997 un ente locale può determinare quali parti della sua area sono di particolare interesse architettonico o storico e può designare queste come aree di conservazione. Il pubblico sarà normalmente consultato su qualsiasi proposta di designare zone di conservazione o di modificarne i confini.Molti sono stati designati nei primi anni'70, ma alcuni sono stati ri-designati, fusi, rinominati, dati confini più piccoli o più grandi e ne sono stati aggiunti di nuovi. Possono coprire terreni storici, campi di battaglia, parchi pubblici, paesaggi progettati o ferrovie, ma la maggior parte contiene gruppi di edifici che si estendono su aree di un villaggio, città o città. Ulteriori controlli di pianificazione sullo sviluppo possono essere effettuati mediante una direzione di cui all'articolo 4, che può essere associata o meno ad una zona di conservazione.   Una direzione di cui all'articolo 4 non è una designazione di conservazione, ma un controllo supplementare all'interno di tali zone. Si tratta di una dichiarazione resa nell'ambito dell'ordine di modifica 2011 della pianificazione urbana e rurale (General Permitted Development) (Scozia). La Direzione, fatta da un'autorità locale e approvata dai ministri scozzesi, rimuove tutti o alcuni dei diritti di sviluppo consentiti su un'area.   L'effetto di una direzione è che l'autorizzazione di pianificazione sarà necessaria per specifici tipi di sviluppo che altrimenti sarebbero considerati come \sviluppo autorizzato\, vale a dire lo sviluppo che non richiede un'applicazione di pianificazione. Le indicazioni possono coprire una varietà di opere minori e possono includere: la sostituzione di porte e finestre, l'erezione di cancelli, recinzioni, garage, capannoni, portici, serbatoi di stoccaggio o l'installazione di antenne satellitari.   Tale insieme di dati dovrebbe essere utilizzato in combinato disposto con l'insieme di dati di cui all'articolo 4 Directions pubblicato anche in tutta la Scozia.Ai sensi del Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) (Scozia) Act 1997 un ente locale può determinare quali parti della sua area sono di particolare interesse architettonico o storico e può designare queste come aree di conservazione. Le indicazioni possono coprire una varietà di opere minori e possono includere: la sostituzione di porte e finestre, l'erezione di cancelli, recinzioni, garage, capannoni, portici, serbatoi di stoccaggio o l'installazione di antenne satellitari.   Tale insieme di dati dovrebbe essere utilizzato in combinato disposto con l'insieme di dati di cui all'articolo 4 Directions pubblicato anche in tutta la Scozia.;Nos termos da Lei de 1997 relativa ao planeamento (edifícios listos e zonas de conservação) (Escócia), uma autoridade local pode determinar quais as partes da sua área de interesse arquitetónico ou histórico especial e pode designá-las como zonas de conservação. O público será normalmente consultado sobre qualquer proposta de designação de zonas de conservação ou de alteração dos seus limites. Existem mais de 600 zonas de conservação na Escócia. Muitos foram designados no início dos anos 70, mas alguns foram redesignados, fundidos, renomeados, dados limites menores ou maiores e novos foram adicionados. Podem cobrir terras históricas, campos de batalha, parques públicos, paisagens projetadas ou caminhos-de-ferro, mas a maioria contém grupos de edifícios que se estendem por áreas de uma aldeia, cidade ou cidade. Podem ser efetuados controlos suplementares do planeamento do desenvolvimento através de uma Direção do artigo 4.º, que pode ou não estar associada a uma zona de conservação.   Uma instrução do artigo 4.º não é uma designação de conservação, mas um controlo adicional nessas zonas.É uma declaração feita sob The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (Escócia) Alteração Order 2011. A Direção, feita por uma autoridade local e aprovada pelos ministros escoceses, elimina todos ou alguns dos direitos de desenvolvimento permitidos numa área.   O efeito de uma Direção é que será necessária uma autorização de planeamento para tipos específicos de desenvolvimento que, de outro modo, seriam considerados «desenvolvimentos autorizados», ou seja, desenvolvimentos que não exigem uma aplicação de planeamento. As direções podem abranger uma variedade de obras menores e podem incluir: a substituição de portas e janelas, a construção de portões, cercas, garagens, galpões, alpendres, tanques de armazenamento ou a instalação de antenas de satélite.  Este conjunto de dados deve ser utilizado em conjunto com o conjunto de dados das Instruções do artigo 4.º também publicado a nível da Escócia. Este conjunto de dados deve ser utilizado em conjunto com o conjunto de dados das Instruções do artigo 4.º também publicado a nível da Escócia.;Faoin Acht um Pleanáil (Foirgnimh agus Limistéir Chaomhantais Liostaithe) (Albain), 1997, is féidir le húdarás áitiúil a chinneadh cé na codanna dá limistéar ar díol spéise ar leith iad ó thaobh ailtireachta nó staire de agus is féidir iad a ainmniú mar Limistéir Chaomhantais. De ghnáth, rachfar i gcomhairle leis an bpobal maidir le haon mholadh chun limistéir chaomhantais a ainmniú nó a dteorainneacha a athrú.Ainmníodh go leor acu go luath sna 1970idí, ach ó shin i leith rinneadh cuid acu a athainmniú, a chumasc, a athainmniú, agus teorainneacha níos lú nó níos mó a thabhairt dóibh agus cuireadh teorainneacha nua leo. Is féidir leo talamh stairiúil, láithreacha catha, páirceanna poiblí, tírdhreacha deartha nó iarnróid a chlúdach ach tá grúpaí foirgneamh i bhformhór na bhfoirgneamh a shíneann thar limistéir de shráidbhaile, baile nó cathair. Is féidir tuilleadh rialuithe pleanála ar fhorbairt a dhéanamh trí Threoir Airteagal 4, a bhféadfadh baint a bheith aige le Limistéar Caomhantais nó nach bhféadfadh baint a bheith aige leis.   Ní ainmniú caomhnaithe é Treoir Airteagal 4 ach rialú breise laistigh de na limistéir sin. Is ráiteas é a rinneadh faoin Ordú um Pleanáil Bailte agus Tíre (Forbairt Ghinearálta Ceadaithe) (Albain) Leasú 2011. Cuireann an Treoir, a rinne údarás áitiúil agus a cheadaigh Airí Albanacha, deireadh le gach ceann nó cuid de na cearta forbartha ceadaithe i gceantar.   Is é an éifeacht atá ag Treoir ná go mbeidh cead pleanála ag teastáil le haghaidh cineálacha sonracha forbartha a mheasfaí seachas sin mar ‘fhorbairt cheadaithe’, i.e. forbairt nach dteastaíonn iarratas pleanála ina leith. Is féidir le treoracha mionoibreacha éagsúla a chlúdach agus d’fhéadfadh na nithe seo a leanas a bheith i gceist leo: doirse agus fuinneoga a athsholáthar, geataí, fálta, garáistí, seideanna, póirsí, umair stórála a thógáil nó aeróga satailíte a shuiteáil.   Ba cheart an tacar sonraí sin a úsáid i gcomhar le tacar sonraí Airteagal 4 a fhoilsítear ar bhonn uile-Albain freisin.Faoin Acht um Pleanáil (Foirgnimh agus Limistéir Chaomhantais Liostaithe) (Albain), 1997, is féidir le húdarás áitiúil a chinneadh cé na codanna dá limistéar ar díol spéise ar leith iad ó thaobh ailtireachta nó staire de agus is féidir iad a ainmniú mar Limistéir Chaomhantais.
